thread.title: These municipalities which have decided to charge the owners of a second home in Franche-Comt\u00e9 a high price
thread.title_full: These municipalities which have decided to charge the owners of a second home in Franche-Comt\u00e9 a high price

author: aurore.
title: These municipalities which have decided to charge the owners of a second home in Franche-Comt\u00e9 a high price
text: Council tax was abolished on main residences last year. But it still applies to second homes. In [Doubs](/tag/Doubs) and Jura, certain municipalities have even decided to increase it. We explain to you who will have to pay the high price. The essentials of the day: our exclusive selection Every day, our editorial team reserves the best regional news for you. A selection just for you, to stay in touch with your regions. [France](/tag/France) Télévisions uses your email address to send you the newsletter “Today’s essentials: our exclusive selection”. You can unsubscribe at any time via the link at the bottom of this newsletter. Our privacy policy It was believed that these autumn leaves had almost all disappeared. But they will fall during November. And at housing tax has been removed from primary residences since 2023, it still applies to secondary residences. And in certain territories, it will even increase! Some municipalities may in fact apply an increase of 5 to 60%. Those which belong to a continuous urbanization zone of more than 50,000 inhabitants where the housing supply is insufficient in relation to demand. Or those who have a high proportion of second homes. - -
